channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree into river, 6th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Five Arches, North Cray, London

item.title: Freezer dumped, 6th August
item.description:
06.08.2025. 20.00hrs. This is the third time I have reported this dumped freezer. Twice it has not been found. I can't give you a postcode as there are no buildings. But. You will find this freezer on Main rd Br5. Approximately 150 yards east of Sevenoaks way and approximately 150 yards west of New mill rd. I have added a picture of Homebase so that there is no mistake

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No fencing on alleyway. Dangerous drop, 6th August
item.description:
There is a path or alleyway from birley road to Baxendale care home. There has been recent building work adjacent to the path and the builders have removed the fence. There is now a 5 metre sheer drop from the footpath down into a gully. It is extremely dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Birley Road, Whetstone, London
Report on FixMyStreet
